title: An Arrow For Venus
description: Cupid, or Jeremy, as the humans know him, is tired, lonely and still horny. Now that he has had his fill of beautiful woman, and men, he feels as if he needs more. In his world, sex was supposed to be forbidden yet Venus has allowed him to fulfill is fantasies. In the past, she might have killed him for it.Venus believes she is immune to love, but Cupid knows better. Allâ€™s she needs is her own arrow to prove his point. Tired of fulfilling others sexual fantasies and quests for love, cupid chooses his next assignment. With the help of Aphrodite Jeremy knows Venus needs a wake-up call and he is just the cupid do give her one. Today Mount Olympus would know that Venus now understands the true meaning of pleasure. Jeremy will be her first fuck in over fifty years. Maybe, she will be his final assignment.
author: Aalexxa Aarows
